response.overview: The Hong Kong super-cop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers at the same time that the villains of the first Police Story are out for revenge.
response.tagline: Jackie Chan escalates his one-man war on crime.
response.title: Police Story 2

titles.title: Ging chaat goo si juk jaap
